           </label>

           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10325461" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10325461').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />

                        var CS_10325464;

           <style>
            #credo_search_content_10325464 { font-family: Arial; }
                        .credo_search_button {
                            color: white;
                            background-color: #B3B0D4;

                            color: #66C;

           </style>
           <div id="credo_search_box_10325464">
            <div>
             <label for="searchText10325464">
              <img src="//search.credoreference.com/images/app/school_search/credo_logo.20d565f9.png" alt="Credo Reference Search" />
             </label>
            </div>
            <div style="padding-top: 5px;">
             <form name="frm_credo_search_10325464" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;" onsubmit="return false;">
              <input name="txt_credo_search10325464" id="txt_credo_search10325464" type="text" style="width: 125px;" onkeypress="function submitCSSearch(e){var evtobj=window.event?event:e;var keycode=evtobj.keyCode;if (keycode == 13) {CS_10325464.Search();}}submitCSSearch(event);" value="" />
              <input name="btn_credo_search10325464" id="btn_credo_search10325464" class="credo_search_button" type="button" onclick="return CS_10325464.Search();" value="Search" />
             </form>
            </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10325472">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10325472">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10325472">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10325472">
          <div id="boxatt10325472" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12554322">
              <a id="link_12554322" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554322,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286439}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554323">
              <a id="link_12554323" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554323,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286445}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554326">
              <a id="link_12554326" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554326,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554328">
              <a id="link_12554328" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=pdh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554328,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364627}); ">
               PsycARTICLES
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by the American Psychological Association and allied organizations.  Note that these articles are included in PsycINFO; no need to search PsycARTICLES if you are already searching PsycINFO.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554329">
              <a id="link_12554329" href="http://scholar.google.com/advanced_scholar_search?hl=en&amp;as_sdt=0,39" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554329,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286463}); ">
               Google Scholar - Biology, Medicine, and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search the Biology, Life Sciences, Environmental Sciences, Medicine, Pharmacology, and Veterinary Science sections of Google Scholar. Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554331">
              <a id="link_12554331" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554331,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, PubMed includes over 19 million citations for biomedical articles back to 1948 and links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554333">
              <a id="link_12554333" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554333,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10325494">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10325494">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10325494">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10325494">
          <div id="boxatt10325494" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12554339">
              <a id="link_12554339" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554339,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12554340">
              <a id="link_12554340" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12554340,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10711503">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10711503">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10711503">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Health Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10711503">
          <div id="boxatt10711503" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link13002198">
              <a id="link_13002198" href="http://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13002198,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13002198}); ">
               MedlinePlus
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Website from the National Institutes of Health with information on diseases, drugs, and wellness issues geared toward patients and families.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link13002222">
              <a id="link_13002222" href="http://www.cdc.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13002222,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Neuroscience Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13002222}); ">
               Centers for Disease Control
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Health and Safety topics from the CDC
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2941526" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
